name: Ariana
title: Manager
blurbs: Hi!! I am Ariana Johnson a fourth year Muir College student studying Human Biology and Public Health. I am an awkward individual, but absolutely love having conversations and am more than happy to answer any coffee related questions, give any suggestions on fun coffee shops to explore, or even ponder the meaning of life with you.

name: Sarah
title: Co-Manager
blurbs: Hi, my name is Sarah!! I'm a third year Joint Mathematics-Economics major from Warren College adopted by Muir Woods. My favorite TV show is Veronica Mars. I enjoy long walks on the beach and traveling to all kinds of new places! I'm constantly in Muir Woods even when I'm not working. Muir is like my second home away from home.

name: Aleesha
blurbs: What's up everybody! My name is Aleesha, and I'm a fourth year ICAM major with a double minor in Psychology and Studio Art. I love to sing, whether I'm messing around on my ukulele or jamming with my acapella group, the Tritones. This is my third year working at the Muir College Center. I love this place and the community of Muir.

name: Natalie
blurbs: I'm Natalie Rhoades, a third year Marine Biology major from Muir College. This is my second year working at Muir Woods so I'm on the lookout for my regulars, especially during Monday night's Happy Hour, 7-9pm! My favorite drink on the menu is a classic latte complete with a little foam art - I've been practicing.

name: Brianna
blurbs: Hi, I'm Brianna! I'm a second year Muir College student majoring in Communications with a double minor in Sociology and Creative Writing. I'm also a freelance photographer, an avid astrology geek, and a fan of rock music. I moved to California from a small town in Florida, so something you may notice about me is my Southern hospitality!

name: Liza
blurbs: Hi everyone! I'm Liza and I am a third year Warren student who has been adopted by Muir Woods. I am a Human Biology major and a Cognitive Science minor. It's my goal this year to figure out how to make a rainbow layered blended latte - I'm really into baking and I'm borrowing inspiration from a rainbow cake I've made before.

name: Maryam
blurbs: Hello! My name is Maryam. I am a second year Political Science International Relations major with a business minor. I love to travel, especially when elephants will be involved. My goal in life is to be an awesome lawyer and save the world a little bit. I am in a committed relationship with nice sunsets and the beach.

name: Navi
blurbs: Hey all! My name is Navi Chahal. I am a third year Human Biology major. When I'm not behind the counter at Muir Woods Coffee Shop, I am a Research Assistant at UCSD. I'm also an avid supporter of the Vagina Monologues. I'm always in the mood for a good cup of coffee. Come by and visit me in the mornings at Muir Woods!

name: Neha
blurbs: Hello! My name is Neha Sodhi, and I am a second year Bioengineering: Biotechnology major from Muir College. This is my first year behind the counter at Muir Woods, and I could not be more excited to be here and serving up the fantastic espresso and coffee that turned me into a caffeine addict.

name: Paul
blurbs: Hello, my name is Paul. I am a 3rd year Psychology major with minors in both Business and Photography. Weird fun facts about me are that I subconsciously shake my hips/dance in my seat when I am eating because it is when I am happiest and I have been known to touch my nose instead of my chin when I am thinking or studying.
